Apr 27 - 28 • May 4 - 5
3:30 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun
[A] Service between Euclid Av, Brooklyn and Lefferts Blvd/Howard Beach, Queens is replaced by free shuttle buses


[A] trains run in two sections:
1. Between 207 St and Euclid Av
 2. Between Howard Beach-JFK Airport and Mott Av

[SB] Buses run along two routes:
1. Local buses run between Euclid Av and Howard Beach via Lefferts Blvd-Ozone Park, making stops at Grant Av, 80, 88 Sts, Rockaway Blvd, 104, 111 Sts, Lefferts Blvd, Aqueduct Racetrack and Aqueduct-North Conduit Av.
2. Express buses run between Euclid Av and Howard Beach-JFK Airport.

• Transfer between trains and [SB] buses at Euclid Av and/or Howard Beach-JFK Airport.

In Brooklyn, days and evenings:
The last stop for some trains headed toward Manhattan is Lorimer St.

10 PM Fri to 1:30 AM Sat • 6 AM Sat to 1:30 AM Sun • 6 AM Sun to 1:30 AM Mon

• Additional [G] service runs days and evenings, connecting with the [L] at Metropolitan Av (Lorimer St), [7] [E] at Court Sq and [A] [C] at Hoyt-Schermerhorn.

In Manhattan, use more frequent M14 buses. The M14A/D serves all [L] stops along 14 St and the M14A connects with the [F] [J] [M] at Delancey St-Essex St.

New Williamsburg Link buses will operate a loop service during the following times:
8 PM Fri to 1:30 AM Sat • 5 AM Sat to 1:30 AM Sun • 5 AM Sun to 1:30 AM Mon
Buses will operate on two routes, one clockwise (B92) and one counterclockwise (B91), making stops at:
Bedford Av, Lorimer St [L]/Metropolitan Av [G], Marcy Av [J] [M] and Hewes St (B92 only) [J] [M]

• Free MetroCard transfers will be available between the Broadway [G], Hewes St and Lorimer St [J] [M] stations and between the Livonia Av [L] and Junius St [3] stations.

At Broadway Junction, consider the [A] [C] and [J] trains for service to/from Manhattan
